stage_script.text: A beginning, is a very delicate time.

fr: Un commençement est un moment d'une délicatesse extrême.
en: A beginning, is a very delicate time.

stage_script.text: Know then, that this is the year ten thousand one ninety one.

fr: Sachez donc que l'on est en l'an 10191
en: Know then, that this is the year 10191

stage_script.text: The Known Universe is ruled by the Padishah Emperor Shaddam IV, my father.

fr: L'Univers Connu est gouverné par l'Empereur Padishah Shaddam IV
... mon père.
en: The Known Universe is ruled by the Padishah Emperor Shaddam IV
... my father.

stage_script.text: In this time, the most precious substance in the universe is the spice Melanjeh.

fr: A cette époque, la plus précieuse substance de l'univers
est l'Epice, le Mélange
en: In this time
the most precious substance in the universe is the spice Melange.

fr: L'Epice accroît la longévité.
en: The spice extends life.

fr: L'Epice amplifie le champ de conscience.
en: The spice expands consciousness.

stage_script.text: The spice is vital to space travel!

fr: L'épice est vitale aux voyages dans l'espace.
en: The spice is vital to space travel!

stage_script.text: The Spacing Guild and its navigators, who the spice has ,mutated, over 4,000 years, use the orange spice gas, which gives them the ability to fold space!

fr: Les navigateurs de la Guilde Spatiale,
que l'epice a fait muter après 4000 ans d'usage
en absorbent le gaz orange
qui leur donne le pouvoir de replier l'espace!
en: The Spacing Guild and its navigators,
who the spice has mutated over 4,000 years
use the orange spice gas
which gives them the ability to fold space!

stage_script.text: That is, travel, to any part of the universe, without moving.

fr: C'est à dire...
de se transporter n'importe où dans l'univers, sans se déplacer.
en: That is travel to any part of the universe without moving.

stage_script.text: Oh? yes? I forgot to tell you! The spice! exists on only one planet, in the entire universe.

fr: Ah oui ... j'oubliais de vous dire...
L'Epice n'existe que sur une seule planète dans tout l'univers.
en: Oh yes... I forgot to tell you!
The spice exists on only one planet, in the entire universe.

stage_script.text: A desolate, dry planet! with vast dezzerts!

fr: Désolée, arride, cette planète possède de vaste déserts.
en: A desolate dry planet with vast deserts!

stage_script.text: Hidden away, within the rocks of these dezzerts, are a people known as the Fremen!

fr: Cachés dans le rochers des cavernes de ces déserts...
...vit un peuple connu sous le nom de Fremen...
en: Hidden away within the rocks of these deserts...
...are a people known as the Fremen ...

stage_script.text: Who have long held a prophecy! That a man would come... A messiah! who would lead them to true freedom.

fr: ...qui depuis longtemps prophétise la venue d'un homme
d'un messie qui les conduirait vers la véritable liberté.
en: ...who have long held a prophecy that a man would come...
a messiah who would lead them to true freedom.

stage_script.text: The planet, is Arrakis! also known as... Dune!

fr: Cette planète, c'est Arrakis, connue aussi sous le nom de ...
Dune.
en: The planet is Arrakis also known as...
Dune.
